metadata.feature_description: Export analytics data to various formats for external analysis

steps.action: Login to DNN as SuperUser and navigate to PersonaBar
steps.expected: PersonaBar should be visible with Dashboard menu
steps.actual: PersonaBar displayed correctly with Dashboard, Content, Manage, Page Analytics, Settings options visible

steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard should load with Export button visible in the header
steps.actual: Community Analytics menu item was selected but the dashboard panel remained empty/blank

steps.action: Wait for dashboard to load and locate Export button
steps.expected: Dashboard should display analytics data with Export button accessible
steps.actual: Dashboard failed to load. Browser console shows JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init

issues: Community Analytics dashboard fails to initialize due to JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function
Export button cannot be accessed because the entire dashboard panel does not render
Error occurs in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at line 1025 during dashboard initialization

observations: Code review confirms Export button exists in social-dashboard.html (line 13) with class 'dashboard-export-btn'
Export functionality in code only supports Excel format via api/dnncorp/cmx/SpreadsheetExport/Excel endpoint - no CSV option exists
The suggested test scenarios mention CSV export, but code analysis shows only Excel export is implemented
The JavaScript error preventing dashboard load is in the utility.serializeCustomDate function call which appears to be undefined or not properly loaded
